channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I think we’ve been lied to’: Who exactly is considered rich in America?
item.description: A middle-class person in America would be considered rich beyond most people’s wildest dreams in many parts of the world.

item.title: This biotech’s stock soared as investors look for the next buyout target
item.description: Dyne Therapeutics’ stock sees record rally, but one analyst says it could still climb a lot further, after a rival got bought out for a big premium.

item.title: Qualcomm ups its game in AI, sending its stock to a 15-month high
item.description: The company is launching chip-based AI accelerator cards for AI inference and data center racks, and is counting Saudi Arabian AI firm Humain as its f...

item.title: ‘I’m in the home stretch’: I’m 80. Do I leave my kids a ‘Magnificent Seven’ dynasty trust or a brokerage account?
item.description: “Do I leave them to pay capital-gains tax on the dynasty trust or estate tax on my personal account?”

item.title: Why the odds of gas prices falling below $2 anytime soon are one in a million
item.description: Gasoline prices at the pump last week fell to their lowest average intraday price in four years, but aren’t likely to see a dip below $2 a gallon any ...

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.
